arStrings.szText: You gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%+|]{/c} increased Armor for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 0"|1%+|]{/c}.
You gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%+|]{/c} increased Armor when dealing damage.
